name: Prescription Refill Tracker
description: Proactively remind patients when their prescriptions are due for refill. Track medication adherence, manage chronic disease prescriptions, and streamline the refill request process.

ğŸ’Š *Prescription Refill Reminder*

âš ï¸ *Prescription Renewal Needed*

ğŸ’Š *Medication Check-in*

Hi {{patient_name}},

Just checking in about your *{{medication_name}}*.

Are you:
1ï¸âƒ£ Taking it as prescribed
2ï¸âƒ£ Having trouble remembering doses
3ï¸âƒ£ Experiencing side effects
4ï¸âƒ£ Stopped taking it
